name: WP Logger
author: WPLogger Teams

sections.description:
This plugin makes it easy to keep a log of activity on your WordPress site.
You can also decide how detailed you want the log to be, whether this is including any minor event or focus on the more substantial updates.
You can get started with the free version.
You can also skip straight to using the premium edition if you need features like email notifications, WordPress reports, and activity log integration tools.

For every event that the plugin records it also reports the:

  • Date & time (and milliseconds) of when it happened,
  • User & role of the user who did the change,
  • Source IP address from where the change happened,
  • The object on which the change has taken place.
sections.installation:
Install WPLogger manually
1. Upload wplogger.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
3. Done. Now you can browse the settings.
sections.faq: Please refer to our General FAQ for all further information.

short_description: WPLogger is a real-time user activity and monitoring log plugin. It helps WordPress webmasters keep an eye on what is happening on their websites.
